Package com.snakk.advertising

This is the Snakk Advertising module.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SnakkAdPrompt AdPrompts are a simple ad unit designed to have a native feel.
SnakkAdPrompt.SnakkAdPromptListener Implement this interface to be notified of AdPrompt lifecycle changes.
SnakkAdRequest Request object used to hold request configuration details.
SnakkAdRequest.Builder Builder object used to generate customized SnakkAdRequest objects.
SnakkBannerAdView.BannerAdListener Implement this interface to be notified of banner ad lifecycle changes.
SnakkInterstitialAd Interstitials are full screen ads that display in their own Activity.
SnakkInterstitialAd.SnakkInterstitialAdListener Implement this interface to be notified of interstitial ad lifecycle changes.
SnakkVideoInterstitialAd Video interstitials are full screen ads that display a video ad in their own Activity.
SnakkVideoInterstitialAd.SnakkVideoInterstitialAdListener Implement this interface to be notified of video interstitial ad lifecycle changes.
 

Class Summary
SnakkAdvertising  
SnakkBannerAdView Banners are ads that are shown within the layout of your app.
 

Enum Summary
SnakkAdRequest.PlacementType  
 

Package com.snakk.advertising Description

This is the Snakk Advertising module.

Overview

The Snakk Advertising SDK provides app monetization functionality.

Build requirements

Android SDK 2.2+ (API level 8) or above

Setup

Update the AndroidManifest.xml with to include the following permissions. These go outside of the application tag: 
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
 uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE"/>

 <!-- Optional permissions to enable ad geotargeting
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION"/>
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION"/>
 -->
An activity is used to display full screen ads. The activity should be defined inside of the application tag: 
 <!-- inside of your application tag: -->
 <activity
      android:name="com.snakk.advertising.internal.SnakkAdActivity"
      android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" />
